short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Clears browsing history and cache for the last day. Simple and easy to use. Free forever.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Clear Today's History and Cache is a handy extension that allows you to quickly and easily clear your browsing history and cache for the last day. With just a click, you can ensure your browsing activities remain private and your browser stays optimized.

Key Features:

- One-click clearing: Clear your browsing history and cache for the last day effortlessly.
- Instant results: Enjoy a refreshed browsing experience by removing unnecessary data from your browser.
- Privacy protection: Maintain your online privacy by deleting your browsing history.
Performance optimization: Improve your browser's performance by clearing cached files.
How to Use:

Click on the extension icon.
Click the "Clear" button to delete your browsing history and cache for the last day.
The current page will be reloaded, and a success message will confirm the clearance.
Clear History and Cache provides a simple and effective solution to maintain your privacy and enhance your browsing experience. Install it now and enjoy a cleaner and faster browser!
